data.description: Exclusive combo package featuring both Still Water Villa and Ripple Home. This unique opportunity includes a 3-bedroom pool villa with Chocolate Hole views and a 4-bedroom masonry home with studio cottage and bi-directional water views.

stillwater.fullDescription: Still Water is a stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bath masonry pool villa that has undergone over $700,000 in comprehensive remodeling. This exceptional property offers elevated Chocolate Hole views that will take your breath away. The home features a brand-new solar system with Tesla Powerwalls for sustainable energy, along with luxury interior upgrades throughout. The open-concept design seamlessly connects indoor and outdoor living spaces, perfect for island lifestyle. The infinity pool overlooks the turquoise waters, creating a private oasis for relaxation and entertainment.
stillwater.description: 3-bedroom, 2-bath masonry pool villa with over $700,000 in remodeling. Features elevated Chocolate Hole views, brand-new solar system, Tesla Powerwalls, and luxury interior upgrades.
stillwater.title: Still Water Villa

ripple.fullDescription: Ripple is a unique masonry home featuring an additional studio cottage with bi-directional water views, beautiful gardens, and gated entry. This exceptional property has an inverted house design with 3 bedrooms on the ground floor and the great room upstairs to maximize the amazing panoramic water views. The home features 21 solar panels with net metering, 2 Tesla power walls, approximately 31,000 gallon cistern plus cottage with 6,750 gallon cistern, grey water system, and internal vacuum system. The property offers the perfect blend of luxury, sustainability, and island living.
ripple.description: Unique masonry home with studio cottage featuring bi-directional water views, beautiful gardens, and gated entry. Includes 21 solar panels, 2 Tesla power walls, and advanced water systems.
ripple.title: Ripple Home

data.location: Chocolate Hole & Coral Bay, St. John
data.title: Still Water & Ripple Combo Package

data.description: Tropical off-grid paradise up Johnny Horn Trail! Coral Bay Eco Retreat Cottage. 2BR/2BA concept. If you have an adventurous heart and enjoy the tranquility of nature, and 4WD, welcome home! Zero footprint, solar power. Stunning view of the Sea, Hurricane Hole, Coral Bay Harbor, and BVI to Virgin Gorda. Spectacular sunrises, sunsets, and moonscapes. Located on peaceful, private, romantic half acre, adjacent to the VI National Park. Hiking lovers heaven. Loft Queen Bedroom. Open air second bed. Large open deck nestled among the trees. Screened main living area. Open air Caribbean style kitchen. Full bath adjacent to bedroom. Half bath on main floor and outdoor garden shower. Short term rental is the past.
amenities: View: British Virgin Islands, Caribbean, Down Island, Harbor, Panoramic
data.location: 17D-3 Emmaus, Coral Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: 17D-3 Emmaus

data.description: Wind Diva is a great Caribbean Cottage close to Coral Bay with Coral Harbor & Hurricane Hole water views. Wrap around deck with covered porch. Upstairs enjoys an open floor plan with kitchen, dining, living room with primary bedroom / bath and laundry room. Beautiful stone walls and pathways for the entrance and down to the lower level where there is a room with a queen bed platform and a desk that could be finished into another bedroom.Off the paved driveway is a small deck with one bedroom / one bath. Ample flat parking area. This cottage is a must see to appreciate! Meticulously maintained
data.location: 1-37A Carolina, Coral Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Wind Diva

data.description: Bay Tree Cottages is a secluded, private end of the road property surrounded by lush large bay rum trees and the natural beauty of Bordeaux Mountain. The main house has a large upstairs kitchen, dining, living area with laundry and the downstairs has one large bedroom with ample closets and ensuite bathroom. Both levels have covered porches. The smaller cottage has kitchen, dining and living area as well with a sleeping loft, shower and separate bathroom with composting toilet. At the entry is a small shop / garage. This gardeners dream property has a lot of potential. Property has certificate of occupancy and permanent power. Buyers to verify cistern size and square foot of buildings.
data.location: 10-49 Carolina, St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Bay Tree Cottage

data.description: Bay Tree Cottages is a secluded, private end of the road property surrounded by lush large bay rum trees and the natural beauty of Bordeaux Mountain. data.description: Stunning location with beautiful vistas of Hurricane Hole, Hurricane national Monument, Round Bay and the East End of St John. This property must be seen to appreciate the natural beauty of this location. This multi property listing offers many scenarios & possibilities for a new owner. The 2 bedroom / 1.5 bath house currently has 14 solar panels & battery backup for off the grid living. This is a unique and rare offering in a pristine area ringed with historic stone walls.
amenities: View: Caribbean, East/sunrise, Harbor, Mountain, Panoramic
data.location: 17E-1 + Emmaus, Coral Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: 17E-1 + Emmaus

data.description: Price reduction! This sweet island cottage, just a few minutes walk to Gifft Hill school, is nestled at end of road in the valley of Gift Hill. This Charming Caribean style home, with partial wrap around decking and lush gardens, is your perfect starter home. Enjoy the fruit trees and ample space for vegetable garden and more. This home is in immaculate condition, featuring new kitchen counters and cabinets, new flooring and a lovely living room with vaulted ceiling and large sliding doors to the outdoor covered decking. The bedroom has a new AC unit with large windows overlooking the lush exterior.The second bedroom, currently used as an art room/office could also be the perfect guest bedroom with private deck outside.
data.location: 9-17-G #22 Glucksberg, Cruz Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Grunwald cottage

data.description: Looking for a great family home where everyone has their own space? Perhaps you're looking for an investment property? Joy Life & Castaway Cottage have all of this and more. And even better, owner financing is available! This listing includes 3 parcels, totaling 2.6 acres, and includes a large one bedroom apartment, a generously-sized studio apartment, an ultra-private standalone cottage & a caretaker's suite. The top level of the main house can easily be converted into an outdoor living space w/ some of the best views on island. There is ample room to add a pool too! This professionally-landscaped property has solar, battery backup, net metering & a Kubota backup generator. Expansive views from Coral Bay Harbor to the East End, BVI & beyond! It is truly a sight to see.
amenities: Included: Dishwasher, Dryer, Freezer,Refrigerator, Stove, Washer
View description: British Virgin Islands, East/sunrise, Harbor, Panoramic
data.location: 11 Freemans Ground, Coral Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Freemans Ground

data.description: Coral Rays is a beautiful + beloved 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom villa overlooking Coral Bay, BVI and beyond, with all the amenities and house systems any homeowner can appreciate, including new AC in all rooms, solar array, two waters systems servicing main house and pod independently yet serves as back up for each, waste water treatment, new low maintenance railing, new decking and more. This successful short term rental has two access points: at upper level main house with large great room and grill deck; at middle level with pool, hot tub and 2 bedrooms; and a lower level pod with 2 bedroom en-suites that are accessed by exterior staircase. The layout was designed for relaxation and fun amidst a very lush tropical landscape and has been enjoyed by the Ray family and their guests for 18 year
data.location: 10-30C-4 Carolina, Coral Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Coral Rays
Ballenna Blue
data.description:
Ballena Blue is a beautiful 3-bedroom, 3-bath villa featuring a new pool surrounded by a spacious sun deck & a shaded cabana area perfect for lounging, dining, & grilling. From both the villa & the pool-conveniently situated side by side-you'll enjoy sweeping panoramic views of Rendezvous Bay & beyond to St. Croix.
Fully air-conditioned and thoughtfully designed for comfort, Ballena Blue offers a warm & inviting atmosphere. Both main-level bedrooms are accessible from the great room, w) the primary suite offering extra space and privacy. The wraparound deck provides ample seating to relax & take in the breathtaking vistas.
A short set of stairs leads down to the third bedroom & bath on the lower level. The villa features an all-paved drive from town with generous parking &turnaround. Improvements List
1. Major driveway and road repairs
2. Added generator
3. New walkway, knee wall, pathway lights, and pathway planters
4. Built pool, pool deck, and staircase to house deck
5. New deck railings, upper and lower
6. Resurfaced both upper and lower decks and re-sealed lower bedroom roof
7. New deck and pool furniture
8. Updated all three bathrooms
9. Updated lower bedroom and installed new AC
10. Updated kitchen; new countertops, stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher, and painted cabinets
11. New furniture, mattresses, and furnishings throughout the house
12. Major landscaping
13. New internal doors, kitchen door, and a new sliding door in owner's bathroom
14. New solar panel for hot water heater
15. Added water filtration system
16. Re-sealed drinking water cisterns and cut a second access hatch.
17. Added grey water cisterns and irrigation

Casa Amor Villa is a beautifully appointed home w)dramatic ocean views including the BVI's, Coral Harbor, East End of St John  & surrounding hillside.A custom designed 2 bedroom / 2 bath villa w) newly installed solar, a pool and good road access with a gated private driveway that offers a 3 car parking area . Currently a successful short term rental with ocean views from every room, outdoor stone shower, travertine floors, solid wood cabinets, teak interior doors & outdoor built in BBQ with sink and prep area. The upper level is accessed off of the car park area. The great Room, kitchen, primary suite w) ensuite bath are located just off the BBQ  / outside dining area and covered sitting area.
data.location: 1-HB-2 ESTATE CAROLINA, Coral Bay, St John, 00830
data.title: Casa Amor Villa

data.description: “Brizan" is a charming, single level 3BR/3BA Carribean home bordering the National Park and nestled on 2/3 acre overlooking Reef Bay and the Caribbean Sea. The main House consists of the kitchen, living, dining and laundry areas along with the master bedroom and bathroom. This island home includes 2 private stand-alone suites on either side of the main house. All 3 structures, the pool & hot tub, share a single level 100' wide IPE ( Brazilian hardwood) deck & is fully enclosed for complete privacy.Enjoy the breezes, the sound of the surf, spectacular views & starry skies from every room. Brizan is solar/battery powered, offers 32K gallons of cistern capacity & boasts 1 year of short term history with 5 star reviews
amenities: View description: Panoramic, South Shore, St. Croix
data.location: 116 Fish Bay, Reef Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Fish Bay

data.description: Well maintained home in Coral Bay. Upper level is a 2 bedroom / 1 bath kitchen dining living room and deck. The lower level is a spacious studio  short term rental with kitchen, dining & living area. Beautifully landscaped with fruit trees, 2 tesla power walls & solar net metering.
data.location: 1-29 Rem Carolina, Coral Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Banana Sweet

data.description: Beautiful 4-bedroom villa with ocean views recently sold.
data.title: Sunset Paradise Villa

data.description: Moonglow Cottage is an octagonal Deltec home with spectacular views of Coral Bay, East End , Haulover ,Hurricane Hole and the British Virgin Islands beyond. Vistas abound from every part of this spacious Caribbean home... there are gentle breezes and an ocean view from every room! The screened outdoor dining veranda is only steps away from a well-appointed gourmet kitchen with owner-created ceramic tiles complementing the stainless steel and granite and custom  cypress cabinetry. An air conditioned bedroom with a king size four-poster bed awaits after star gazing in the spa. Every attention to detail was made from floor (nonslip tiles) to ceiling (custom cypress ceiling). Down a flight of stairs takes you to a beautiful 1 bedroom / 1 bath apartment with the same gorgeous views.
data.location: Coral Bay, St. John, US Virgin Islands
data.title: Moonglow Cottage

data.description: Well maintained home in Coral Bay. Upper level is a 2 bedroom / 1 bath kitchen dining living room and deck. The lower level is a spacious studio  short term rental with kitchen, dining & living area. Beautifully landscaped with fruit trees, 2 tesla power walls & solar net metering.
data.location: 1-29 Rem Carolina, Coral Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Banana Sweet

data.description: Unparalleled Views & Endless Potential! Perched on over half an acre across two parcels, this solid masonry and native stone 2-bed, 2-bath home offers privacy, easy paved access, and breathtaking views. Owners buried power lines for unobstructed sunrises, moonrises, and stargazing—visible from every room. The upper level features a great room, kitchen, full bath (outdoor shower), and custom mahogany Murphy bed. The mid-level has two bedrooms, a full bath (outdoor shower), and can convert into a separate apartment. Freshly resealed cisterns March 2025. Enjoy plentiful flat parking, single car garage and storage, plus room to add bedrooms, a pool, or a second home.
data.location: 2-7 & 2-4 Concordia, Coral Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Concordia

data.description: Bonny's Abode is a fun, eclectic, cozy cottage made w) love with beautiful panoramic views of Hurricane Hole, the entrance to Coral Harbor, Fortsberg, East End and the BVI beyond. Plenty of room to build another house at the top of the parcel with even higher panoramic views! The main area is where the kitchen, counter top bar and living area are, just outside is a covered porch leading to a deck, bedroom, bathroom, upper deck and primary bedroom. Beautiful rock formations and fruit trees like mango, genip, lime grow on the property. Downstairs studio apartment allows for additional guests or rental. The upper portion of property is accessed from Andy's Way & offers ample room to build another house on the property.
amenities: View description: British Virgin Islands, Down Island, East/sunrise, Harbor, Panoramic
Water view: British Virgin Islands,Down Island,Harbor
data.location: 28-17 Calabash Boom, Coral Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Bonny's Abode

data.description: Nestled along the turquoise shores of Friis Bay, this charming 2bed/2bath beach house is a rare find — and on the market for the very first time. Lovingly maintained, the home blends island charm with quality construction, featuring concrete and native stone, copper gutters, custom louvered windows, and granite countertops. Step onto your seaside deck and enjoy the soothing sound of waves, refreshing sea breezes, and snorkeling just footsteps away. Set on a flat, easy access parcel, the property also includes a parcel directly across the road — ideal for a second house, expanded compound, or preserved green space. Affectionately known as ''the blue-fence next to iconic Miss Lucy's,'' this well-loved island retreat offers a unique opportunity to own a piece of St. John's soul.
data.location: 13BB-10 13BB-7 Hard Labor, Coral Bay St John, US VI 00830
data.title: Friis Bay

data.description:
Double Vision is an unique masonry home with an additional studio cottage with bi- directional water views, beautiful gardens and gated entry / fenced in property. Double Vision has an inverted house design with the 3 bedrooms on the ground floor and the great room upstairs to maximize the amazing panoramic water views to the south east and north west. The upper level has a covered wrap around porch. The lower bedroom area has a large covered porch facing Coral Harbor. An additional studio masonry cottage on the property is private with its own gate and offers the ability to have a caretaker or long / short term tenant. The great room in the main house is spacious with vaulted ceilings & well laid out kitchen with custom mahogany cabinetry & quartz counter tops. Must see to appreciate ! Property has 21 solar panels, net metering & 2 power walls.
Main house has approx 31,000 gallon cistern & the cottage 6750
The cottage has it's own pump systems but there is plumbing conduit between the two houses to transfer water
Grey water system for the garden
Apple room to add a pool
Cottage has AC
Easy to add AC to main house, two bedrooms have conduit for that
Main house has an internally installed vacuum system ! Great feature.
data.location: 6B-22 St. Quaco & Zimmerman, St John, VI 00830
data.title: Double Vision
